frame.name: Kidnapping
frame.definition:
<def-root>The words in this frame describe situations in which a <fen>Perpetrator</fen> carries off and holds the <fen>Victim</fen> against his or her will by force. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Perpetrator">Two men</fex> <t>kidnapped</t> <fex name="Victim">a Millwall soccer club employee</fex>, police said last night.</ex>
<ex>Not even the <t>abduction</t> <fex name="Victim">of his children</fex> <fex name="Perp">by Captain Hook and his scurvy sidekick, Smee</fex>, can shake Peter's scepticism.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Perpetrator
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Perpetrator</fen> is the person (or other agent) who carries off and holds the <fen>Victim</fen> against his or her will.</def-root>

FE.name: Victim
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Victim</fen> is the person who is carried off and held against his/her will.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Source</fen> is the initial location of the <fen>Victim</fen> before it changes location.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Goal</fen> is the place in which the <fen>Victim</fen> ends up.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Manner in which the kidnapping takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act performed by the <fen>Perpetrator</fen> that helps them accomplish the kidnapping.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> is what the <fen>Perpetrator</fen> hopes to accomplish by kidnapping.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> expresses why the <fen>Perpetrator</fen> commits the kidnapping.</def-root>

FE.name: Co-participant
FE.definition: <def-root>An additional abductee taken along with the <fen>Victim</fen>. <ex>She was <t>abducted</t> <fex name="Co-participant">with her brother</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The period of time for which the <fen>Victim</fen> is held by the <fen>Perpetrator</fen>
<ex>Two young man <t>abducted</t> her <fex name="Duration">for about two hours</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition:
<def-root>The number of times that the <fen>Victim</fen> is kidnapped.
<ex> The prelate was <t>kidnapped</t> <fex name="Frequency">twice</fex> in the last two years</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: kidnappen.v
lexUnit.definition: de genoemde onder dwang meenemen en gevangen houden, meestal om iets af te dwingen

lexUnit.name: ontvoeren.v
lexUnit.definition: de genoemde onder dwang meenemen naar een verborgen plaats, zonder dat je daar het recht toe hebt
